author: Joseph Guzman
title: Bill Gates: Trump's cut of WHO funding during coronavirus pandemic is 'as dangerous as it sounds' | TheHill - The Hill
description: Bill Gates: Trump's cut of WHO funding during coronavirus pandemic is 'as dangerous as it sounds' | TheHill The Hill Global battle erupts as Trump pulls WHO funding over coronavirus response Fox News Trump halts World Health Organization funding over handling…
content:
Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates is calling President Trumps decision to halt funding for the World Health Organization (WHO) during the global coronavirus pandemic as dangerous as it sounds.
